    • Method Detail

      • getBitmap

        public android.graphics.Bitmap getBitmap()
        Returns a raw bitmap that will have the same number of pixels as available dots for the PrinterSettings given in the constructor
        Returns:
        A bitmap with width == printer dots

      • getScaledBitmap

        public android.graphics.Bitmap getScaledBitmap(android.content.Context context)
        Returns a scaled bitmap that will be scaled according to the current screen/display. This bitmap when displayed on the screen will have a size equal to the physical size of the printout according to the parameter in PrinterSettings.getPrintableWidth() (in mm).
        Parameters:
        context - The current Android context
        Returns:
        A scaled bitmap that can be shown on the screen to provide an indication of what the exact printout will look like

      • getCompressedBitmap

        public byte[] getCompressedBitmap()
        Returns the bitmap as a compressed byte[] at 100% quality encoded in PNG format
        Returns:
        A byte[] containing the image data

      • splitLongTextRow

        protected java.util.List<TextRow> splitLongTextRow(TextRow textRow)

      • determineHeight

        public int determineHeight()
        Returns the estimated height of the receipt in dots/pixels
        Returns:
        The estimated height in pixels
